# Video Bob
<!--
@name: Video Bob
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>

Assign a video loaded with the "Load Asset" command as a Bob Image
## Parameters

- **videon**: Index of video.
- **bobindex**: Index of Bob image.
---
